translation.en: Ball one to Johnny Damon and we are under way.
translation.es: Primera bola a Johnny Damon y empezamos.

translation.en: Damon has eight hits in 18 at bats...
...a double, a triple, a couple of stolen bases.
He had four hits in the series opener.
translation.es: Tuvo 4 hits en el primer juego de la serie.

translation.en: Strike.
Down the right- field line, fair off the bat of Damon.
It rolls by Spencer.
And Damon will coast into second base with a leadoff double.
translation.es: Y Damon llegará a segunda base con un doble.

translation.en: Into right- center field, broken bat, it'll fall, a base hit.
translation.es: Al jardín central, bate roto, hit sencillo.

translation.en: They wave around Damon. He will score.
translation.es: Damon va a seguir y va a anotar.

translation.en: And Jason Giambi delivers...
...with a run- scoring single here in the opening inning.
translation.es: ...una carrera con un sencillo en la entrada inicial.

translation.en: And the Athletics have taken that 1- nothing lead.
Let's go, Yankees! Let's go, Yankees!
Bases loaded.
The Yankees have the tying run at second, down 2- nothing.
translation.es: ...los Yanquis tienen la carrera del empate en segunda.

translation.en: The A's are kicking it and throwing it all over the field.
translation.es: Los Atléticos están tirando la bola por todos lados.

translation.en: And it might lead to their elimination if they don't get it right in a hurry.
translation.es: No van a poder seguir si no corrigen su juego.

translation.en: Hammered down the right- field line. Justice!
translation.es: ¡Y le pega con todo por la línea del jardín derecho! ¡Justice!

translation.en: The Yankees have taken the lead.
They're standing, anticipating another trip...
translation.es: Están de pie, esperando otro viaje...

translation.en: ...to the League Championship Series.
translation.es: ...a la Serie de Campeonato de la liga.

translation.en: The Yankees one out away.
translation.es: Los Yanquis están a un out de ganar.

translation.en: Eric Byrnes, never with an at bat in Yankee Stadium...
translation.es: Eric Byrnes que nunca ha bateado en este estadio.

translation.en: ...and they don't get much bigger than this one.
Or more hectic when you're up there trying to get a job done.
translation.es: Y muy ajetreada, cuando estás tratando de ganar.

translation.en: And they're a strike away.
And they're roaring in the Bronx.
Losing the first two games at home in the best- of- five series...
translation.es: Perder los primeros dos juegos en su casa en la serie a tres...

translation.en: ...and roar back to--
The Yankees will defend their title.
translation.es: ¡Los Yanquis van a defender su título!

translation.en: It's okay, Joe, you can leave it on.
translation.es: Está bien, la puedes dejar prendida.

translation.en: - I don't need to watch. - Joe, leave it on.
Imagine how bad it'd be if you were a Yankee player...
translation.es: Sería un problema ser de los Yanquis...

translation.en: ...and didn't like the taste of champagne.
Better ask to get traded.
translation.es: Como para irse a otro equipo.

translation.en: You know how many kids are wearing Giambi's-- ?
You know, Oakland Giambi's jerseys and hats and pictures and posters?
translation.es: ...tienen camisetas y sombreros y fotos de Giambi?

translation.en: Those same kids will be booing in July when the Yankees come here.
Is it Giambi that's stabbing the back or the Pinstripes on the East Coast?
translation.es: ¿Pero Giambi es el traidor o los ejecutivos de la Costa Este?

translation.en: You can't blame them for pilfering the henhouse.
translation.es: No puede echarles la culpa por saquear el gallinero.

translation.en: - The henhouse is there. - I can't blame them?
They're offering $120 million over six years.
The Yankees have deeper pockets and they're willing to give him money.
translation.es: Los Yanquis tienen más dinero y están dispuestos a dárselo.

translation.en: They're pilfering our players.
It's like we're a farm system for the New York Yankees.
- How are the guys doing? - That was a killer.
That was a killer. It's a tough one to swallow. It's....
- They played great. - They played their hearts out.
They did. They played fantastic. It just didn't fall our way.
translation.es: Jugaron fantástico, pero no tuvimos suerte.

translation.en: - You'll do better next year. - But we were close, though.
translation.es: -Les irá mejor el año entrante. -Faltó poco.

translation.en: - We were so close. - Right there.
Almost had it. You gotta feel good about that.
translation.es: Casi. Te tienes que sentir bien.

translation.en: I feel great about it. I feel great about it.
We're not gonna do better next year.
translation.es: No nos va a ir mejor.

translation.en: - Why not? - Well, you know we're being gutted.
We're losing Giambi, Damon, Isringhausen.
translation.es: Vamos a perder a Giambi, Damon, Isringhausen.

translation.en: Done deal. We're in trouble.
translation.es: Es un hecho. Estamos en apuros.

translation.en: You'll find new guys. You found Jason, you found Damon.
translation.es: Ya encontrarás a otros. Encontraste a Jason y Damon.

translation.en: - I need more money, Steve. - Billy.
- I need more money. - We don't have any.
I can't compete against $120 million with $38 million.
translation.es: No puedo competir contra 120 millones con 38 millones.

translation.en: We're not gonna compete with these teams that have big budgets.
translation.es: No vamos a competir con los equipos ricos.

translation.en: We're gonna work within the constraints we have...
...and you're gonna do the best job that you can recruiting new players.
translation.es: ...y harás una buena labor reclutando jugadores nuevos.

translation.en: We're not gonna pay $17 million to players.
translation.es: No vamos a pagar 17 millones al año.

translation.en: I'm not asking you...
...for 10 or 20, 30 million dollars.
I'm just asking for a bit of help.
translation.es: Solamente quiero un poco de ayuda.

translation.en: Get me a little closer and I will get you that championship team.
translation.es: Acérqueme un poco y le daré un equipo de campeonato.

translation.en: I mean, this is why I'm here. This is why you hired me.
translation.es: Por eso estoy aquí, por eso me contrató.

translation.en: And I gotta ask you, what are we doing here...
translation.es: Y le tengo que preguntar: ¿qué estamos haciendo aquí?

translation.en: - Billy, I-- - ...if it's not to win a championship?
- I wanna win just as much-- - That's my bar. My bar is here.
translation.es: -Yo quiero ganar. -Este es mi listón. Está aquí.

translation.en: My bar is to take this team to the championship.
translation.es: Mi listón es ganar un campeonato.

translation.en: Billy, we're a small- market team, and you're a small- market GM.
translation.es: Somos un equipo de mercado chico y tú eres su gerente.

translation.en: I'm asking you to be okay not spending money that I don't have.
translation.es: Te pido que no gastes dinero que no tengo.

translation.en: And I'm asking you to take a deep breath...
...shake off the loss, get back in a room with your guys...
translation.es: ...te sacudas esta derrota, regreses con tu gente...

translation.en: ...and figure out how to find replacements for the guys we lost...
...with the money that we do have.
I'm not leaving here. I'm not-- I can't leave here with that.
translation.es: No me voy a ir de aquí. No puedo irme de aquí con eso.

translation.en: What else can I help you with?
It's a good offer, and you gotta match it. I--
translation.es: Es una buena oferta y la tienes que igualar.

translation.en: I need another day.
His mind's pretty made up. I just think you should know that.
translation.es: Él ya está decidido. Necesitas saberlo.

translation.en: - I got a call. I'll get you back. - I'll let him know.
translation.es: -Está entrando una llamada. Te llamo. -Le voy a avisar.

translation.en: - Yeah? - Billy, Scott.
- Just got off the phone with Dan. - You didn't.
translation.es: -Acabo de colgar con Dan. -¡No es cierto!

translation.en: I was surprised he called me.
Stop. I got Johnny for 7.5 or he doesn't play anywhere else.
translation.es: Tengo a Johnny por 7,5 o no juega en otro equipo.

translation.en: - That's the deal you made. - Boston just upped it to 7.75.
translation.es: -Ese es el trato. -Boston subió la oferta a 7,75.

translation.en: You there?
- We had a deal, Scott. - We have a deal, if it's 8 million.
translation.es: -Habíamos hecho un trato. -Cerramos el trato si son 8 millones.

translation.en: - Oh, man, you played me. - I'm just doing my job for my client.
translation.es: -Cómo me manipulaste. -Solo estoy haciendo mi trabajo.

translation.en: No, you're playing me, and you're still playing me.
Congratulations, asshole. You win.
I like guys that got a little hair on their ass.
He looks like a Mantle or a Mays, quite frankly.
- He's got a baseball body. - Matty, who do you got?
translation.es: -Tiene cuerpo de beisbolista. -Matty, ¿a quién tienes tú?

translation.en: - I like Geronimo. - Yes.
The guy's an athlete. Big, fast, talented.
translation.es: Es un atleta: grande, veloz, talentoso.

translation.en: - Top of my list. - Clean- cut, good face.
translation.es: -El primero en mi lista. -Decente, buena cara.

translation.en: - Yeah, good jaw. - Five- tools guy.
- Good- looking ballplayer. - Can he hit?
- He's got a beautiful swing. - The ball explodes off his bat.
He throws the club head at the ball, and when he connects...
translation.es: Les pega con la cabeza del bate y cuando conecta...

translation.en: ...he drives it, it pops off the bat.
- You can hear it all over the ballpark. - A lot of pop.
translation.es: -Se oye en todo el estadio. -Con la cabeza del bate.

translation.en: If he's good, why doesn't he hit good?
- He is a good hitter. - He'll be ready.
He's gonna be a good hitter against big- league arms?
translation.es: ¿Va a poder contra brazos de grandes ligas?

translation.en: - Could be great. - I don't think so.
Kid needs at bats. Give him 400 at bats, he's gonna get better.
translation.es: Necesita experiencia. 400 veces al bate y mejora.

translation.en: - He can play. - He's hit everywhere along the line.
He's one of our guys.
Okay, let's move on.
- Artie, who do you like? - I like Perez. He's got a classic swing.
translation.es: Artie, ¿a ti quién te gusta? A mí me gusta Pérez. Tiene un swing clásico.

translation.en: - It's a real clean stroke. - I don't know. Can't hit the curveball.
translation.es: -Un golpe limpio. -No le da a las curvas.

translation.en: There's some work to be done, I'll admit that, but he's noticeable.
translation.es: Necesita entrenar, lo admito. Pero es notable.

translation.en: - Got an ugly girlfriend. - What's that mean?
Ugly girlfriend means no confidence.
translation.es: Tiene poca confianza en sí mismo.

translation.en: You are full of it. Artie is right. This guy's got an attitude.
translation.es: Se equivocan. Artie tiene razón. El tipo es agresivo.

translation.en: An attitude is good.
He walks in a room, his dick's already been there for two minutes.
translation.es: Entra al cuarto, su pene ya lleva ahí dos minutos.

translation.en: He passes the eye- candy test. Got the looks.
He's ready to play the part. He just needs playing time.
translation.es: Está listo, sólo necesita tiempo de juego.

translation.en: I'm just saying, his girlfriend is a six at best.
translation.es: Su novia es un seis, cuando mucho.

translation.en: Look, if we're trying to replace Giambi, this guy could be it.
translation.es: Si queremos reemplazar a Giambi, quizá sea el indicado.

translation.en: I agree with you.
Damn, Billy, was that a suggestion?
Guys, you're just talking.
Talking...like this is business as usual.
translation.es: Hablando a lo tonto, como si fuera una situación normal.

translation.en: It's not.
We're trying to solve the problem.
Not like this. You're not looking at the problem.
translation.es: Así no. Ni lo están viendo.

translation.en: We're very aware of the problem. I mean--
Okay, good. What's the problem?
Look, Billy, we all understand what the problem is.
translation.es: Mira, Billy, todos entendemos cuál es el problema.

translation.en: - We have to-- - Okay, good. What's the problem?
We have to replace three key players in our lineup.
translation.es: Tenemos que reemplazar a tres jugadores clave.

translation.en: Nope. What's the problem?
We gotta replace these guys with what we have--
translation.es: Tenemos que reemplazar a tres jugadores.

translation.en: No. What's the problem, Barry?
We need 38 home runs, 120 RBIs and 47 doubles to replace.
The problem we're trying to solve is that there are rich teams...
translation.es: El problema es que hay equipos ricos...

translation.en: ...and there are poor teams, then there's 50 feet of crap...
translation.es: ...y equipos pobres. Luego hay 15 metros de porquería...

translation.en: ...and then there's us.
It's an unfair game.
And now we've been gutted. We're like organ donors for the rich.
translation.es: Nos destriparon. Somos donadores de órganos para los ricos.

translation.en: Boston's taken our kidneys, Yankees have taken our heart.
translation.es: Boston nos quitó los riñones, los Yanquis el corazón...

translation.en: And you guys sit around...
...talking the same old good body nonsense like we're selling jeans.
translation.es: ...hablando de buenos cuerpos como si vendiéramos ropa.

translation.en: Like we're looking for Fabio.
We got to think differently.
translation.es: Hay que pensar de otro modo.

translation.en: We are the last dog at the bowl.
translation.es: Somos el último perro en comer.

translation.en: You see what happens to the runt of the litter? He dies.
translation.es: Ya saben lo que le pasa al enano de la camada. Se muere.

translation.en: Billy, that's a very touching story and everything...
...but I think we're all very much aware of what we're facing.
translation.es: ...pero sabemos a lo que nos enfrentamos.

translation.en: You have a lot of experience and wisdom in this room.
translation.es: Tienes mucha experiencia en este cuarto.

translation.en: You need to have a little faith and let us do the job of replacing Giambi.
translation.es: Confía en nosotros y déjanos reemplazar a Giambi.

translation.en: Is there another first baseman like Giambi?
- No, not really. - No.
- If there was, could we afford him? - Nope.
translation.es: ¿Si lo hubiera, tendríamos dinero para contratarlo?

translation.en: Then what the fuck are you talking about, man?
If we try to play like the Yankees in here...
translation.es: Si tratamos de jugar como los Yanquis acá dentro...

translation.en: ...we will lose to the Yankees out there.
translation.es: ...los Yanquis nos van a ganar allá afuera.

translation.en: Boy, that sounds like fortune- cookie wisdom to me, Billy.
translation.es: Suena a sabiduría de galletas chinas.

translation.en: - No, that's just logic. - Who's Fabio?
He's a shortstop. He's a shortstop from Seattle.
translation.es: Un parador en corto de Seattle.

translation.en: Now, this is no time to push the panic button.
translation.es: No hay que apretar el botón de pánico.

translation.en: Our scouts will find players, Player Development will develop them.
translation.es: Los buscadores van a encontrar talento. Lo vamos a desarrollar...

translation.en: We'll teach them to play Oakland A baseball.
translation.es: ...y a enseñar cómo jugar a nuestro modo.

translation.en: With all due respect, we've been doing this a long time.
translation.es: Con el debido respeto, llevamos mucho tiempo haciendo esto.

translation.en: Why don't you just let us be responsible for replacing Giambi...
translation.es: Déjanos la labor de reemplazar a Giambi...

translation.en: ...with who we know that can play?
- Easy power. - And loose.
Good face.
This son of a bitch is going in the first round.
translation.es: Lo van a elegir en la primera ronda.

translation.en: You're a premium player, Billy.
translation.es: Eres un jugador de primera, Billy.

translation.en: You can run, you can field, you can throw, you can hit...
...you can hit with power.
That doesn't come along very often.
translation.es: Eso no se da a menudo.

translation.en: This is Tom Martinez, national cross- checker.
translation.es: Él es Tom Martínez, verificador nacional.

translation.en: - How you doing? Nice to meet you. - Billy Beane.
It's been a while since I've seen a five- tool guy that can do everything.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no había visto un jugador completo, de 5 herramientas.

translation.en: I'm hopeful your interest in professional baseball...
translation.es: Espero que el béisbol te interese tanto...

translation.en: ...is as strong as ours is gonna be in getting you in this upcoming draft.
translation.es: ...como nos va a interesar a nosotros seleccionarte.

translation.en: Mr. Beane?
Mark is ready to see you now.
- How you doing? - I'm fine.
- How are you? - Good.
- Hey, Billy. - Hey, Mark.
- Good to see you. Please sit down. - You too.
translation.es: Qué gusto verte. Por favor, siéntate.

translation.en: - These are the guys. Guys, Billy. - Boys.
- How's it going? - All right. How you been?
- You're filling out that chair nicely. - I got three weeks in it right now.
translation.es: -Llenas bien esa silla. -Tengo tres semanas en ella.

translation.en: - Yeah, man. How you doing? - Fantastic.
- Awesome. - Couldn't be better.
That's good to hear. I'm not gonna waste your time.
translation.es: Qué bien. No voy a hacerte perder el tiempo.

translation.en: You just tell me what you're looking for.
Fifty million dollars in additional payroll.
You should try Giambi.
I'm sorry. Too soon, right? I want this to be a friendly meeting.
translation.es: Perdón. Quiero que sea una cita amistosa.

translation.en: It's not all on your shoulders.
translation.es: Pero no todo depende de ti.

translation.en: - Where's Steve in this? - Steve's great.
He's supportive in rebuilding this team.
translation.es: Me apoya para reconstruir al equipo.

translation.en: That's what we're gonna do.
- So, what are you looking for? - A left- handed reliever.
I'm thinking Ricardo Rincon.
That's not gonna happen.
Not even a discussion?
Billy, even if you could afford him, respectfully, we love him.
translation.es: Ni aunque tuvieras el dinero, respetuosamente, nos encanta.

translation.en: We're not about to let him go.
You got this Venezuelan kid coming up.
translation.es: Tienen al chico venezolano de las menores.

translation.en: We had him. We moved him to Detroit.
translation.es: Lo teníamos. Se lo dimos a Detroit.

translation.en: What else you thinking?
Outfielders.
- To replace Damon? - Yeah.
- In your price range? No disrespect. - Enough, Mark.
translation.es: ¿Con lo que pagan Uds.? No te ofendas. Ya basta, Mark.

translation.en: Hollins?
- García? - No.
Maybe Coste.
That's it.
- All right, tell me about García. - To replace Johnny Damon?
translation.es: -Cuéntame más de García. -¿Para suplir a Johnny Damon?

translation.en: - Mark, is he healthy? - Yeah, he's healthy- ish.
He had that back thing.
- He'll be ready for spring ball. - I'll tell you what.
translation.es: Va a estar listo en primavera.

translation.en: I can give you Guthrie if you kick in some cash.
translation.es: Te puedo dar a Guthrie, si me das dinero.

translation.en: - Mark Guthrie? - Yeah.
- How much cash? - Two hundred K.
- So García's gonna be a no. - You're kidding me, right?
translation.es: -García no va a ser posible. -Estás bromeando, ¿verdad?

translation.en: - You're kidding me. - I'm not.
Okay. Straight up, García for Guthrie, no kicker.
translation.es: Bueno. Un intercambio directo, García por Guthrie, sin dinero.

translation.en: - No kicker? - Straight up.
I think it's gonna be a hard no on García, but let's just keep going.
translation.es: Creo que el no es definitivo, pero sigamos.

translation.en: - What else you thinking? - What are we doing? Is this business?
This is the way we do business in Cleveland.
- Hello. - Who are you?
I'm Peter Brand.
What do you do?
I'm special assistant to Mark Shapiro.
translation.es: Soy ayudante especial de Mark Shapiro.

translation.en: So, what do you do?
Mostly player analysis right now.
translation.es: Más que nada, análisis de jugadores.

translation.en: Been on the job long? First job in baseball?
translation.es: ¿Llevas mucho tiempo? ¿Primer trabajo en el béisbol?

translation.en: It's my first job anywhere.
- Wow, congrats. - Thank you.
First job. Whose nephew are you?
translation.es: Tu primer trabajo. ¿De quién eres sobrino?

translation.en: Why does Mark listen to you?
I don't think....
I don't think he does very often.
He just did.
Well, in that circumstance...
...I think he was more listening to Bruce than myself.
translation.es: ...le hacía más caso a Bruce que a mí.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Peter Brand.
I don't give a rat's ass what your name is.
translation.es: Me importa un bledo cómo te llamas.

translation.en: What happened in there?
What happened in that room?
I'm not quite sure what you're asking me, Mr. Beane.
translation.es: No estoy seguro de qué me está preguntando.

translation.en: What did you tell Bruce?
- I just told Bruce I like García. - You like García. Why?
translation.es: -Le dije que a mí me gustaba García. -¿Te gusta García? ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Why?
I don't know.
There is an epidemic failure within the game...
translation.es: Hay una falla epidémica dentro del juego.

translation.en: ...to understand what is really happening.
translation.es: No entienden lo que está pasando.

translation.en: And this leads people who run Major League Baseball teams...
translation.es: Y eso hace que la gente que maneja equipos de grandes ligas...

translation.en: ...to misjudge their players and mismanage their teams.
translation.es: ...evalúe mal a los jugadores y administre mal a sus equipos.

translation.en: I apologize.
Go on.
Okay. People who run ball clubs, they think in terms of buying players.
translation.es: La gente que dirige equipos piensa en términos de comprar jugadores.

translation.en: Your goal shouldn't be to buy players. Your goal should be to buy wins.
translation.es: La meta no debe ser comprar jugadores sino comprar victorias.

translation.en: And in order to buy wins, you need to buy runs.
translation.es: Y para comprar victorias, necesita comprar carreras.

translation.en: You're trying to replace Johnny Damon.
translation.es: Ud. quiere reemplazar a Johnny Damon.

translation.en: The Red Sox see Johnny Damon...
translation.es: Los Medias Rojas ven a Johnny Damon...

translation.en: ...and they see a star who's worth $7.5 million a year.
translation.es: ...y ven una estrella de 7,5 millones al año.

translation.en: When I see Johnny Damon...
translation.es: Cuando yo veo a Johnny Damon...

translation.en: ...what I see is...
...an imperfect understanding of where runs come from.
translation.es: ...una comprensión imperfecta de dónde vienen las carreras.

translation.en: The guy's got a great glove.
translation.es: El tipo tiene un excelente guante.

translation.en: He's a decent leadoff hitter. He can steal bases.
translation.es: Es buen primer bate. Roba bases.

translation.en: But is he worth the $7.5 million a year...
...that the Boston Red Sox are paying him?
translation.es: ...que los Medias Rojas le están pagando?

translation.en: No. No.
Baseball thinking is medieval.
They are asking all the wrong questions.
And if I say it to anybody, I'm ostracized. I'm a leper.
translation.es: Y si lo digo, me repudian. Me vuelvo un leproso.

translation.en: So that's why I'm cagey about this with you.
translation.es: Por eso estoy siendo cauteloso con usted.

translation.en: That's why--
I respect you, Mr. Beane, and if you want full disclosure...
translation.es: Yo lo respeto, señor Beane, y si quiere que le sea sincero...

translation.en: ...I think it's a good thing that you got Damon off your payroll.
translation.es: ...me parece bien que haya sacado a Damon de su nómina.

translation.en: I think it opens up all kinds of interesting possibilities.
translation.es: Le abre todo tipo de posibilidades interesantes.

translation.en: - Where you from, Pete? - Maryland.
- Where'd you go to school? - Yale. I went to Yale.
- What'd you study? - Economics.
I studied economics.
Yale, economics and baseball.
You're funny, Pete.
Tell me, why Billy?
What is it that makes him special?
Very rare do you come upon a young man like Billy...
translation.es: Es raro toparse con un joven como Billy...

translation.en: ...who can run, who can field, who can throw, who can hit...
...and who can hit with power.
Those five tools, you don't see that very often.
translation.es: Esas cinco herramientas no las ve uno muy a menudo.

translation.en: Most of the youngsters that we have an interest in...
translation.es: La mayoría de los jóvenes que nos interesan...

translation.en: ...have one or two tools...
...and we're hoping to develop an extra one.
Your son has five.
We're looking at a guy that's a potential superstar for us in New York.
translation.es: Estamos viendo una súper estrella para nosotros.

translation.en: The time is now to get him started.
We're prepared to make a sizable financial commitment.
translation.es: Estamos dispuestos a invertir mucho en él.

translation.en: The Mets are gonna stand behind Billy...
translation.es: Los Mets van a apoyar a Billy...

translation.en: ...because we expect him to be our big- league center fielder.
translation.es: ...porque esperamos que sea nuestro jardinero central.

translation.en: This check here represents the offer...
...that the New York Mets would be making to Billy.
translation.es: ...que los Mets le harán a Billy.

translation.en: You do know that he's been accepted to Stanford on a full scholarship?
translation.es: ¿Sabe que lo aceptaron en Stanford con una beca completa?

translation.en: I do.
So he can do both?
Unfortunately, he can't do Stanford and professional baseball.
translation.es: Desgraciadamente, no puede jugar en Stanford y profesionalmente.

translation.en: He would have to pick one or the other.

He could've gone to Stanford.

translation.es: Tienes un buscador de talento con 29 años de experiencia.

translation.en: You're listening to the wrong one.
translation.es: Estás haciéndole caso al que no debes.

translation.en: Now, there are intangibles that only baseball people understand.
translation.es: Hay intangibles que sólo la gente de béisbol entiende.

translation.en: You're discounting what scouts have done for 150 years? Even yourself?
translation.es: ¿Descartas lo que buscadores de talento han hecho durante 150 años?

translation.en: Adapt or die.
This is about you and your shit, isn't it?
Twenty years ago, some scout got it wrong.
translation.es: Hace 20 años, un buscador se equivocó.

translation.en: - Okay. Okay. - Now you declare war on the system.
translation.es: Así que le declaras la guerra al sistema.

translation.en: Okay, okay, my turn. You don't have a crystal ball.
translation.es: Bueno, me toca a mí. Tú no tienes una bola de cristal.

translation.en: You can't look at a kid and predict his future any more than I can.
translation.es: Ni tú ni yo podemos ver a un chico y predecir su futuro.

translation.en: I've sat at those kitchen tables with you...
...and listened to you tell parents, When I know, I know.
translation.es: ...y te he oído decirle a los padres: Cuando lo sé, lo sé...

translation.en: And when it comes to your son, I know.
translation.es: ...y tratándose de su hijo, lo sé.

translation.en: And you don't.
You don't.
Okay. I don't give a shit about friendship...
...this situation, or the past.
Major League Baseball thinks the way I think. You're not gonna win.
translation.es: La organización que dirige el béisbol piensa como yo. No vas a ganar.

translation.en: And I'll give you a nickel's worth of free advice.
translation.es: Y te voy a dar un consejo gratis.

translation.en: You're never gonna get another job...
...after this catastrophic season you're about to set us all up for.
translation.es: ...después de este año catastrófico al que nos estás condenando.

translation.en: You'll have to explain to your kid...
translation.es: Le vas a tener que explicar a tu hija...

translation.en: ...why you're working at Dick's Sporting Goods.
I'm not gonna fire you, Grady.
translation.es: No te voy a despedir, Grady.

translation.en: - Fuck you, Billy. - Now I will.
Good luck, Art.
Kubota. You never played ball, right?
- I played a little T- ball. - You're the new head scout.
translation.es: -Sólo cuando era niño, a bola parada. -Eres el nuevo buscador de talento.

translation.en: Congratulations.
So Boston's gonna wait and see?
Yeah.
- Yeah. - It's just you and me, Pete.
And we're all in.
It sounds like you're apologizing for what they're doing.
translation.es: Estás pidiendo disculpas por lo que están haciendo.

translation.en: I'm not. I just don't know what you're gonna do...
translation.es: No es eso. No sé qué pueden hacer...

translation.en: ...with the budget that the A's have. Who are you gonna get?
translation.es: ...con un presupuesto como el de los Atléticos.

translation.en: I'm looking at the spring- training roster.
translation.es: Estoy viendo a la gente en la nómina.

translation.en: - You gotta be kidding me. - How so?
- He looked like a clown out there. - Who?
- Chad Bradford. - Tell me about Bradford.
I like him a little bit, but he's a specialist.
translation.es: Me gusta un poco, pero es un especialista.

translation.en: He's not a guy that you say, The eighth inning is yours...
translation.es: No lo ves y dices: La 8a. entrada es tuya...

translation.en: ...lefties vs. righties.
In my opinion.
I don't know what Billy Beane and management...
translation.es: No sé qué saben de él...

translation.en: ...understands about him.
He only throws the ball about 82, 83 miles an hour.
translation.es: Lanza la bola a sólo 131, 132 km/hora.

translation.en: - There must be something-- - He is a freak, and not in a good way.
translation.es: Es un fenómeno y no en un buen sentido.

translation.en: - Let me ask you this. - Talking about trying to win a division.
We're counting on David to be the guy he was.
translation.es: Y quieres que Justice sea el que era.

translation.en: I have my doubts. He's gotten old.
That's why he's not in New York anymore, not in Cleveland anymore.
translation.es: Por eso ya no está en Nueva York ni en Cleveland.

translation.en: We paid him the money we should've been giving to Johnny Damon.
translation.es: ¡Le pagamos todo el dinero que le deberíamos haber dado a Damon!

translation.en: That's the one to worry about.
He gets comps up and down Vegas more than in Oakland.
translation.es: Le regalan más cosas en Las Vegas que en Oakland.

translation.en: That should tell you something right there.
- Isn't that the deal with these guys? - He has one good year.
And he gets a huge offer and then he gets traded.
translation.es: ¡Y le hacen una oferta enorme y lo transfieren!

translation.en: - Bob. Harder. - Hatteberg.
Billy, we have to talk about Hatteberg.
- Go. - There's just no feel for the spot.
I think it's a long shot that he can be a big- league first baseman.
translation.es: No va a poder jugar en primera.

translation.en: It's day one of the first week. You can't judge this yet.
translation.es: Es el primer día. Todavía no puedes juzgarlo.

translation.en: No, I think we can judge it.
I mean, I like him, you know, but I can judge him.
translation.es: A mí me agrada, pero lo puedo juzgar.

translation.en: First base is the moon to him.
translation.es: Primera base es la luna para él.

translation.en: It wasn't to Giambi. Giambi's the worst first baseman in baseball.
translation.es: No lo era para Giambi. Y él es el peor primera base de la liga.

translation.en: - Gonna compare him to Giambi? - What are we talking about?
translation.es: -¿Lo estás comparando con Giambi? -¿De qué estamos hablando?

translation.en: What do you think, Wash?
The nice way to say it is he lacks confidence.
translation.es: Para decirlo bonito: le falta confianza.

translation.en: Well, give him some.
I'll do that, but we got Peña, who can play first.
translation.es: Puedo hacerlo, pero tenemos a Peña, que juega primera.

translation.en: And he's looking mighty good out there.
We wanna go with Hattie.
We got six weeks.
Get down in it.
- There you go. - Scotty H.
- That's what I'm talking about. - Picking machine.
It's only baseball.
This better work.
I'm just kidding you.
Let's go, Oakland!
Let's go, Oakland!
- What is wrong with this thing? - It's a dollar, man.
- What? - Welcome to Oakland, D.J.
Oh, you gotta be shitting me.
I think this year, we're gonna show that it takes a team to win...
translation.es: Creo que este año vamos a demostrar que necesitas un equipo para ganar...

translation.en: ...not any individual guy, just a team.
And I think we got a hell of a ball club here.
translation.es: Y creo que tenemos un club excelente.

translation.en: Chad, are you intimidated at all today?
I wouldn't say I'm intimidated, really. I'm just really excited, like you said.
translation.es: No me siento intimidado. Sólo estoy emocionado, como dijiste.

translation.en: Jeremy, how's the team gonna fare without your brother, Jason?
translation.es: Jeremy Giambi, ¿cómo le va a ir al equipo sin tu hermano?

translation.en: Well, you know, the organization did a great job...
translation.es: En cuanto a ocupar ese lugar, la organización se lució...

translation.en: ...of bringing in good young guys to fill that role.
Let's face it, they're getting a deal with you.
translation.es: La verdad, fuiste una ganga para ellos.

translation.en: The Yankees are paying Jason a lot of money.
translation.es: Los Yanquis le pagan a Jason...

translation.en: You are coming here on a dime. How does that make you feel?
translation.es: ...mucho más que a ti. ¿Cómo te hace sentir?

translation.en: I feel good.
- How are the nerves in your fingers? - You know.
translation.es: -¿Qué tal los nervios de tus dedos? -Ya sabes.

translation.en: Gotta start with the age, 36 years old.
translation.es: Tengo que empezar con la edad, 36 años.

translation.en: How do you think your body's gonna hold up?
You spend a lot of time at strip clubs, partying.
translation.es: Pasas mucho tiempo en clubes de desnudistas y fiestas.

translation.en: Do you resent the attention you get off the field?
I love it.
- You spend a lot of time in Vegas. - I do.
- I feel great. I did a lot of work to get-- - Excuse me. Get out of my shot.
translation.es: -Me siento bien. Me preparé mucho. -Disculpa. Quítate de mi toma.

translation.en: Sorry, go ahead.
There have been questions about my age...
translation.es: Yo sé que hay dudas sobre mi edad...

translation.en: ...and my declining skills, some say, but I'm here to prove that wrong.
translation.es: ...y sobre mis habilidades pero voy a silenciarlas.

translation.en: I asked if you were 100 percent.
- Excuse me, Mr. Beane? - Hey, Chad.
- Hey, I'm not disturbing you, am I? - Not at all. What's up?
I wanted to say thank you for this opportunity.
Well, we enjoy having you. It's gonna work out well for all of us.
translation.es: Nos da gusto tenerte aquí. Nos va a beneficiar a todos.

translation.en: I appreciate it, sir. Nobody's ever given me a chance like this before.
translation.es: Se lo agradezco. Nadie me había dado una oportunidad así a este nivel.

translation.en: Nobody?
Well, just you, sir.
Well, it's a big day, one you won't forget.
translation.es: Es un día importante, un día que no olvidarás.

translation.en: Appreciate it. And I wanna let you know...
...I'm gonna be praying for you and your family.
translation.es: ...y voy a rezar por usted y su familia.

translation.en: No problem.
Well, here we are just minutes away from the season opener of 2002...
translation.es: Estamos a punto de iniciar la temporada de 2002...

translation.en: ...for the Oakland A's.
The first pitch is moments away.
We'll come back with the national anthem.
translation.es: Volveremos con el himno nacional. No se vayan.

translation.en: Opening day is upon us.
I'm going in. Text me the play- by- play.
translation.es: Voy adentro. Descríbeme por texto lo que pase.

translation.en: What? Why?
I don't watch the games.
That's the third Ranger batter to be hit today.
translation.es: Es el tercer bateador Ranger golpeado hoy.

translation.en: Twice Alex Rodriguez was nicked. The ninth--
translation.es: Rozaron a Alex Rodríguez dos veces.

translation.en: I should've made you a bigger part of the conversation from day one.
translation.es: Te debería haber incluido más en la conversación.

translation.en: It'd be clear what we're trying to do.
translation.es: Tendrías más claro lo que queremos hacer.

translation.en: That was my mistake, Art. I take responsibility for that.
translation.es: Ese fue mi error. Yo asumo toda responsabilidad.

translation.en: - What are you trying to say? - Doesn't matter what moves I make...
translation.es: -¿Qué insinúas? -No importa lo que yo haga...

translation.en: ...if you don't play the team the way they're designed to be.
translation.es: ...si no usas al equipo como está planeado.

translation.en: Billy, you're out of your depth.
translation.es: Billy, no sabes en lo que te metiste.

translation.en: - Why not Hatteberg at first? - Because he can't play first.
translation.es: -¿Por qué no Hatteberg en primera? -No sabe jugar primera.

translation.en: - How do you know? - Not my first baseball game.
- Scott Hatteberg can't hit. - He gets on base.
translation.es: -Hatteberg no le pega a la bola. -Se embasa.

translation.en: Still keeps us in the plus column. We need to be seven over .500.
translation.es: Nos mantiene ganando. Necesitamos estar juegos arriba de .500.

translation.en: What?
Anything else?
Yeah. I would've rather seen Bradford in the end than Magnante.
translation.es: Hubiera preferido ver a Bradford que a Magnante.

translation.en: Bradford's a righty.
- I don't care about righty- lefty. - I do.
- Could this be about your contract? - No.
This is about you doing your job and me doing mine.
translation.es: Se trata de tú hacer lo tuyo y yo hacer lo mío.

translation.en: Mine's me being left alone...
...to manage this team you assembled for me.
- I didn't assemble them for you, Art. - No shit.
translation.es: -Yo no lo armé para ti. -No me digas.

translation.en: Good meeting.
Every time we talk...
...I'm reinvigorated by my love of the game.
We got Grady Fuson, former head of scouting with the Athletics.
translation.es: Tenemos a Grady Fuson, ex buscador de talento de los A.

translation.en: And, Grady, can you interpret for us what's going on?
translation.es: ¿Nos puedes interpretar lo que está pasando?

translation.en: - They call it Moneyball. - Moneyball?
translation.es: Lo llaman: El Juego de la Fortuna.

translation.en: Yes, and it was a nice theory, and now it's just not working out.
translation.es: Era una buena teoría pero no está dando resultado.

translation.en: Billy Beane has built this team on the ideas of a guy, Bill James...
translation.es: Billy Beane formó el equipo basándose en las ideas de Bill James.

translation.en: ...who wrote an interesting book on baseball statistics.
translation.es: Este escribió un libro interesante sobre estadísticas.

translation.en: The problem is that Bill James never played, never managed.
translation.es: El problema es que Bill James nunca jugó ni manejó.

translation.en: He was in fact a security guard at a pork- and- beans company.
translation.es: Era un guardia en una empresa enlatadora.

translation.en: Do you see this as a decimation of the organization?
- He bought a ticket on the Titanic. - Oh, boy.
translation.es: Yo creo que compró un boleto en el Titanic.

translation.en: He's tried to come up with a new approach.
My hat's off to him. It won't work.
translation.es: Le hago una reverencia. No va a funcionar.

translation.en: One- two pitch. Tejada strikes out.
translation.es: El lanzamiento de 1-2. Tejada se poncha.

translation.en: And that is the game.
The Seattle Mariners win both games on this series, Ray.
translation.es: Seattle gana ambos juegos de la serie.

translation.en: They've won 10 in a row. Seattle is 13 and 3.
I can't watch this shit.
Go on the road with the team.
You don't go on the road with the team.
translation.es: Tú no viajas con el equipo.

translation.en: - That's why I want you to do it. - Why don't you?
translation.es: -Por eso quiero que vayas. -¿Por qué no vas tú?

translation.en: I can't develop personal relationships with these guys.
translation.es: No puedo desarrollar relaciones con los jugadores.

translation.en: I gotta be able to trade them, send them down, sometimes cut them.
translation.es: Tengo que poder canjearlos, enviarlos a las menores, despedirlos.

translation.en: Which is something you should learn to do, by the way.
translation.es: Algo que tú deberías aprender a hacer.

translation.en: I would never have to cut a player, unless you....
translation.es: Yo jamás tendría que echar a nadie, a menos que tú...

translation.en: - Oh, come on. - Come on what?
- Let's practice. - No.
Yeah. I'm a player. You gotta cut me from the roster.
translation.es: Yo soy un jugador y tú tienes que despedirme.

translation.en: - No. - Go.
- What do you mean, no? - No.
- Do it. - This is stupid.
Part of the job, man.
Fine.
Billy, please have a seat. I need to talk to you for a minute.
Go on.
You've been a huge part of this team.
translation.es: Has sido una parte vital del equipo...

translation.en: But sometimes you have to make decisions for the team. I'm sure you can understand.
translation.es: ...pero a veces hay que hacer lo mejor para todo el equipo.

translation.en: - You're cutting me? - I'm really sorry.
I just bought a house here.
translation.es: Acabo de comprar una casa aquí.

translation.en: - Well.... - In Oakland.
Well.... Well....
Well.... Well....? That's all you got to say?
translation.es: ¿Pues, ah, pues? ¿Eso es todo lo que tienes que decir?

translation.en: My kid just started a new school.
translation.es: Mi hijo está en una escuela nueva.

translation.en: - They made friends. - That's....
You shouldn't pull them out in the middle of the year.
translation.es: No deberías sacarlo a mitad del año escolar.

translation.en: - You should wait. - What the hell are you talking about?
I don't know. I shouldn't have--
I'm not gonna do this. I think this is stupid.
translation.es: No voy a hacer esto. Es una idiotez.

translation.en: I'm not gonna fire anybody, and this is dumb.
translation.es: No voy a despedir a nadie y esto es absurdo.

translation.en: They're professional ballplayers. Just be straight with them.
translation.es: Son jugadores profesionales. Diles la verdad.

translation.en: No fluff, just facts.
Pete, I gotta let you go. Jack's office will handle the details.
translation.es: Tengo que cortarte. La oficina de Jack manejará los detalles.

translation.en: That's it?
Really?
You rather get a bullet to the head or five to the chest and bleed to death?
translation.es: ¿Prefieres un balazo a la cabeza o cinco al pecho y desangrarte?

translation.en: Are those my only two options?
Go on the road with the team.
translation.es: Vete de gira con el equipo.

translation.en: Say, bro.
- Let me ask you a question. - Yeah.
How come your boss doesn't travel with the team?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tu jefe no viaja con el equipo?

translation.en: He doesn't like to mingle with the players.
translation.es: No le gusta fraternizar con los jugadores.

translation.en: Is that supposed to make us easier to cut?
I don't know. I don't know.
And how come soda is a dollar in the clubhouse?
translation.es: ¿Por qué los refrescos cuestan un dólar en los vestidores?

translation.en: I never seen nothing like that.
Billy likes to keep the money on the field.
translation.es: A Billy le gusta gastar el dinero en el campo.

translation.en: Soda money?
Really?
Where on the field is the dollar I'm paying for soda?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el dólar de mi refresco?

translation.en: It's hard to see exactly...
- ...but it's there, yeah. - Yeah, it is hard to see.
I'm done.
- Hey, Dad. - Hi, honey.
- How are you? - I'm good.
- Was it bumpy? - It was okay.
So with this loss tonight, the Oakland Athletics...
translation.es: Con esta derrota, los Atléticos de Oakland...

translation.en: ...incredibly, have lost 14 of their last 17 games.
They are 10 games back in the American League West.
translation.es: Están 10 juegos abajo en la Liga Americana Oeste.

translation.en: Is it fair to say the experiment has failed?
Well, absolutely. It was predictable.
You don't wish anybody a lack of success...
translation.es: No le deseas a nadie que fracase...

translation.en: - ...but the facts are in front of you. - You can't blame Art Howe.
translation.es: -...pero están los hechos. -No pueden culpar a Art Howe.

translation.en: - No. - The fact of the matter is... ...this is not about statistics, this is about people.
translation.es: No se trata de las estadísticas, sino de los peloteros.

translation.en: Art Howe is not the problem.
translation.es: Art Howe no es el problema.

translation.en: The problem is in the general manager's office...
translation.es: El problema es la gerencia general...

translation.en: ...with Billy Beane.
The root of the problem for me is philosophical.
translation.es: La raíz del problema es filosófica.

translation.en: I said it before. This is fantasy baseball.
Billy is just not thinking.
Start thinking about a new GM, making changes.
translation.es: Necesitamos pensar en conseguir un nuevo gerente.

translation.en: He never goes to the games.
- This was very predictable. - He needs to look at what's going on.
translation.es: Esto era muy predecible y lo estamos viendo.

translation.en: - The man needs to get real. - I want Billy Beane gone.
translation.es: -Necesita encarar la realidad. -Quiero que se largue Billy Beane.

translation.en: Calling for Beane's head. I want your thoughts.
translation.es: Están pidiendo la cabeza de Billy. ¿Qué opinan?

translation.en: The past 18 games, they've been shut out or scored one run four times.
translation.es: Los blanquearon o anotaron una carrera 4 veces.

translation.en: They're just not scoring enough.
It's not just the offense, not Thad Bosley and the hitters.
translation.es: Pero no es sólo la ofensiva Thad Bosley y los bateadores.

translation.en: It's everything. If there was one thing you could pick out, you'd try to fix it...
translation.es: Es todo. Si fuera una cosa, la tratarías de arreglar...

translation.en: ...but just everything is in a funk right now.
What the hell am I doing?
Oh, man.
Look, Steve.
I believe in what we're doing.
translation.es: Creo en lo que estamos haciendo.

translation.en: The record doesn't reflect the strength of this team...
translation.es: El récord no refleja la fuerza del equipo...

translation.en: ...or where we're gonna be at the end of the season.
Now, Pete and I here feel very strongly that we stay on the track we've chosen.
translation.es: Pete y yo pensamos que debemos seguir por el camino que tomamos.

translation.en: Our sample size has been too small. It's too--
translation.es: El tamaño de nuestra muestra fue muy pequeño.

translation.en: Early. It's still early.
Where do we expect to be by the All- Star break?
Our goal and our expectation...
...is by mid- July to be within seven games of first.
translation.es: ...es que a mediados de julio estemos a juegos del primer lugar.

translation.en: That would be this working.
- That keeps us in the hunt. - Exceptionally well.
- By July. - July.
And what's gonna prevent you from accomplishing that?
translation.es: ¿Y qué les va a impedir lograr eso?

translation.en: What are you afraid of?
Nothing. That's why we're here, Steve.
translation.es: De nada. Por eso estamos aquí.

translation.en: That's why we get up in the morning. That's all we do.
translation.es: Por eso nos levantamos en la mañana. Eso hacemos.

translation.en: - More? - Yeah, a little more.
- Don't tell your mother. - I won't.
translation.es: -No le digas a tu mamá. -No le diré nada.

translation.en: - Chocolate sauce? - Yes.
Stop.
- Big spoon or little spoon? - Little spoon.
Thank you.
Dad, there's no way you're gonna lose your job, right?
translation.es: No vas a perder tu trabajo, ¿verdad?

translation.en: What?
- Well, I don't know. I'm just wondering. - Where'd you hear that?
Well, I go on the Internet sometimes.
translation.es: A veces me meto en internet.

translation.en: Well, don't do that. Don't go on the Internet.
translation.es: No hagas eso. No te metas en internet.

translation.en: Or watch TV or read newspapers...
translation.es: Ni veas la tele, ni leas los periódicos...

translation.en: ...or talk to people.
I don't talk to people. I just read stuff.
translation.es: No hablo con nadie. Sólo leo cosas.

translation.en: Honey, everything's fine. Everything's fine.
translation.es: Mi vida, todo está bien. Todo está bien.

translation.en: Really, you don't have to worry.
But if you lose your job, will you have to move away?
translation.es: Pero si te despiden, ¿te vas a tener que mudar?

translation.en: Honey, I'm not gonna lose my job.
You don't have to worry.
- There's no problem. - Okay.
All right? I got uptown problems, which are not problems at all.
You're not worried, right?
- No, I'm not worried. - Okay.
I want Dye in right...
translation.es: Quiero a Dye en el derecho...

translation.en: ...Justice DH'ing, Peña on the bench...
translation.es: ...a Justice de emergente, Peña en la banca...

translation.en: ...Hatteberg at first...
...and anyone but Mags first out of the pen.
translation.es: ...y cualquiera, menos Mags, de primer relevista.

translation.en: You want Peña on the bench?
That's right. So you can play Hattie.
translation.es: Así es, para que puedas alinear a Hatte.

translation.en: Peña is not only the best first baseman...
translation.es: Peña no sólo es el mejor primera base...

translation.en: ...he's the only first baseman.
Hattie gets on base more than Peña.
translation.es: Hatte se embasa más que Peña.

translation.en: - In fact, 20 percent more. - And his fielding?
translation.es: -20 por ciento más veces. -¿Y su fildeo?

translation.en: His fielding does not matter.
- I've heard enough of this. - Have you?
translation.es: -Ya me harté de esta conversación. -¿Ah, sí?

translation.en: I disagree with you, plain and simple.
translation.es: Y no estoy de acuerdo contigo, así de sencillo.

translation.en: And moreover, I'm playing my team...
translation.es: Voy a alinear a mi equipo...

translation.en: ...in a way that I can explain in job interviews next winter.
translation.es: ...de una manera justificable en entrevistas de trabajo.

translation.en: Okay?
Hattie. Not Peña.
What's up, skip?
- How you doing? - Good, how you doing, man?
Get some sleep last night?
As the A's hit the field, we are ready for baseball.
translation.es: Salen los A al diamante y estamos listos para jugar.

translation.en: First one out of the dugout is rookie sensation Carlos Peña...
translation.es: El primero que sale es el novato, Carlos Peña...

translation.en: ...one of the few bright lights in this lineup, taking his spot at first base.
translation.es: ...una de las pocas lumbreras del equipo y se va a primera.

translation.en: Billy, quick question. Do you expect these guys to produce more or-- ?
- Not now. - What's the reason for the slump?
translation.es: -Ahora no, amigos. -¿Por qué la racha perdedora?

translation.en: Get down.
Is losing fun?
- Is losing fun? - No.
What are you having fun for?
That's what losing sounds like.
Are you okay, Dad?
- You're doing it again. - What?
You're worrying about me.
You're in last place, Dad.
- Do I look worried? - Yeah.

They're making a joke out of the American League.

translation.en: It has slingshot the A's into first in the AL West.

How do you explain, otherwise, the victories they've come up with?

...Murderers' Row, some people still say the best team ever.
translation.es: ...La Fila de Asesinos, el mejor equipo que ha habido.

translation.en: The A's were on page one of the New York Times.

The Oakland A's have tied the Philadelphia A's.

translation.es: ¡El récord universal de la franquicia 17 seguidos...

translation.es: ...y la racha ganadora más larga desde 1953!

The A's scored six in the first, one in the second, four in the third.

Eleven to nothing, the A's do lead.
- Shit. - Foul off the foot of Ibañez....

Let's go, Oakland!
Let's go, Oakland!

And Art Howe on the way to the mound to make a pitching change.

...where it could get out of control for the Athletics.
We're all told at some point we can no longer play the children's game.

...maybe bring in a pinch runner.

Crazy. Just plain crazy.
Hatteberg is mobbed at home plate.

...from a statistical, bean- counting point of view.
It's won on the field with fundamental play.
translation.es: Ganas en el campo jugando bien.

Well, baseball can hate him, you know.

Sounds nice.

translation.es: ...y ganaste más juegos sin ellos que con ellos.

translation.es: Ganaste el mismo número de juegos que los Yanquis...

I know you're taking it in the teeth, but the first guy through the wall...

Always. This is threatening not just a way of doing business...

Really, what it's threatening is their livelihood, their jobs.
translation.es: Estás amenazando su subsistencia, sus trabajos.

translation.en: It's threatening the way that they do things.
translation.es: Estás amenazando su manera de hacer las cosas.

translation.en: Every time that happens...
...whether it's a government, a way of doing business, whatever...
translation.es: ...ya sea en un gobierno o en un negocio...

translation.en: ...the people who are holding the reins...
...they have their hands on the switch...
...they go batshit crazy.

translation.en: Heads up.
What was that?
- Sorry. I don't know. - What the hell was that?
You knucklehead.

Impressive.
Did Henry make you a good offer, at least?
- Doesn't matter. Doesn't matter. - What was it? What was it?
- Doesn't matter. - What was it?

So what?
I made one decision in my life based on money.
translation.es: Tomé una decisión en mi vida basada en el dinero.
